feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 5:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: N 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
